TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Two Graphics Wish Topic (KSP2GWT)

Articles.Content: Um. The graphics in KSP aren't that great. What I mean is that there are no clouds. In KSP2 i want it to be bueatiful eOn everyplanet I want them to be beautiful where ever you are.
For my part, I actually hope the attempt to make the graphics better doesn't take focus away from the gameplay and such... Pretty graphics is a nice bonus, IMHO, not a primary selling point.

2 hours ago, Multivac said:

attempt to make the graphics better doesn't take focus away from the gameplay

Typically, people who work on VFX don't work on gameplay. Separate teams, eh?
